title: Clarendon-style serif font with ball terminals
author: whitgreen

comments.content:
Hello,  
Could someone please help me figure out what typeface the letters are in? I do not need to know what typeface the numbers are. Thank you.

Appears to be Georgia, commonly bundled with most computers' operating systems:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ascender/georgia/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160152/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ascender/georgia/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ascender/georgia/")
